courses.title: DINE RESTAURANT WEBSITE
courses.description: Indulge your senses with our Dine Restaurant website, where exquisite tastes meet elegant design. Discover culinary delights, reserve your table, and experience a feast for both palate and eyes.

courses.title: TRIP PLANNER
courses.description: Embark on an AI-powered journey with our trip planner, seamlessly blending technology and travel expertise. Personalize your itinerary, discover hidden gems, and unlock unforgettable experiences with every click.

courses.title: REACT QUIZ APP
courses.description: Engage with React like never before in this quiz app exclusively dedicated to React-related questions. Test your knowledge, deepen your understanding, and level up your React skills with every answer.

courses.title: OrganizePro
courses.slug: A todo list app made with react
courses.description: Elevate your productivity with OrganizePro, a React-powered to-do list app designed to streamline your tasks. Stay organized, prioritize efficiently, and conquer your day with ease.

courses.title: 2048-Game
courses.description: Experience the addictive puzzle challenge of 2048 with this browser-based game crafted using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Merge tiles strategically to reach the elusive 2048 tile!

courses.title: TIC-TAC-TOE-GAME
courses.slug: A simple tic tac toe game interface
courses.description: Enjoy the timeless game of Tic-Tac-Toe brought to life using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Play against friends or family in this simple yet engaging web-based rendition.

courses.title: NST-WEBSITE-CLONE
courses.description: Experience the nostalgia of the past with our NST website clone. Relive the classic design and functionality of the original site, revamped for modern browsing while preserving its timeless charm.

courses.title: MEMORY-GAME
courses.description: Challenge your memory and have fun with our Memory Game. Match pairs of cards to sharpen your recall skills and enjoy hours of entertainment with this classic and addictive game.

courses.title: IMAGE-GALLERY
courses.description: Discover stunning images with our Image Gallery and Lightbox feature. Dive into captivating visuals and easily navigate through pictures for a seamless viewing experience

courses.title: CampusLink
courses.description: CampusLink: Bridging juniors and seniors, our hackathon-winning project fosters connection within campuses. Empower juniors to seek guidance, mentorship, and valuable insights from seasoned seniors.

courses.title: JeeBuddy
courses.description: Introducing JeeBuddy: Your chatbot companion for JEE aspirants, our Google Cloud hackathon project. Get instant support, guidance, and valuable resources tailored to your JEE preparation journey.

courses.title: LinkedIn-Clone
courses.description: Experience the essence of LinkedIn with our landing page clone. Seamlessly crafted to reflect LinkedIn's professional aesthetic, explore familiar features and begin your journey towards networking excellence.
